description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user (or object) to transform into an elephant hybrid and a full elephant at will. It grants the size and strength of an elephant combined with the durability of the base form.

users.circumstances: Funkfreed, Spandam's sword, has absorbed this Devil Fruit through Vegapunk's technology, becoming an animate elephant-sword.

abilityReveals.description: The Zou Zou no Mi has been fed to an inanimate object (a sword), giving it life and the ability to transform into an elephant.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Funkfreed appears alongside Spandam at Enies Lobby as a living sword with Devil Fruit powers.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim (though as a sword, this is less relevant)

strengths.strength: Elephant form provides immense size and strength
strengths.description: Can transform between sword, hybrid, and full elephant forms.

strengths.strength: Combines sword durability with elephant power
strengths.description: As a sword with Devil Fruit powers, Funkfreed can be both a weapon and a combatant.

description: Paulie's signature fighting style using special Galley-La Company ropes. He can store seemingly infinite amounts of rope and use them to bind, strike, or rescue others. The ropes are strong enough to support giants and King Bulls.

users.circumstances: Paulie uses his Rope Action expertise as a rigger and shipwright for combat and rescue operations.

abilityReveals.description: Paulie uses his ropes to grab and rescue multiple people simultaneously, pulling them to safety from the Aqua Laguna.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Paulie saves Luffy, Nami, Zoro, and Chopper from the massive Aqua Laguna wave by pulling them all to the rooftops with his ropes.

strengths.description: Can use ropes for offense, defense, binding, and rescue operations.
Paulie appears to store endless amounts of rope, possibly in hammerspace or special coat lining.
